label: 篳篥
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: A small but loud reed pipe made of bamboo.  The "greater hichiriki" mentioned in "Suetsumuhana," a larger version of the standard instrument, was not normally played by ranking nobles, and its use had died out by the author's time.[篳篥、末摘花][RK]
